attributes.action: Make the BBC bring back 'the Radio 4 UK theme tune' in its original morning slot.
attributes.additional_details: Instruct the BBC to restore the Radio 4 UK theme to its early morning slot to recognise its positive impact on productivity by enabling people to 'hit the ground running' in the morning.

rejection.details: It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content.
